title: Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout
content:
ane's Portrait (X:-732, Y:597) Sword of the Emperor (X:-734, Y:589) Chains (X:-739, Y:594) Empty Brain Jar (X:-745, Y:593) Recipe for Fiddlehead Soup (X:-744, Y:587) Dog Collar (X:-742, Y:584)

How to unlock Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout

You can acquire this quest when you reach Elfsong Tavern.

Visit the Emperor's Old Hideout Rewards

Sword of the Emperor Cerebral Citadel Armour (In Emperor's Wardrobe) Cerebral Citadel Gloves (In Emperor's Wardrobe) Good relationship with the emperor trigger
